snippet: Jon Gillock, organist and student of Messiaen, played his teacher’s work on Tuesday at the Church of the Ascension.
abstract: Steve Smith reviews concert of Messiaen works performed by organist Jon Gillock at Church of the Ascension.
lead_paragraph: Jon Gillock, organist and student of Messiaen, played his teacher’s work on Tuesday at the Church of the Ascension.

headline.seo: Jon Gillock Plays Messiaen at Church of the Ascension
